thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com
thread.title: Alex

author: Alex
title: Alex
text:
I've been shopping at B&H for many years, I never had any issues with their products or with their service. Shopping online is nowadays for everybody but B&H was one of the first retailers that I trusted with my online shopping, and after all these years they are still beating the competition! Their store in NYC, is also a great place if you can make a trip to NYC, the staff is more than helpful, knowledgeable about their products and willing to answer all any questions you can throw at, on my visit to NYC, I spent a good time there, the staff helped me me putting together my photo gear, from choosing the right tripod, to the lenses, and to the memory cards, etc!
B&H is the candy store for photo and tech aficionados :)
